    • Method Detail

      • getPlayMode

        public Playlist.PlayMode getPlayMode()
        Return the current play mode.
        Returns:
        A Playlist.PlayMode object.

      • setPlayMode

        public void setPlayMode(Playlist.PlayMode playMode)
        Set the play mode for the playlist. It changes the behaviour of the playlist on determining the next or previous item to be played or not.
        Parameters:
        playMode - The Playlist.PlayMode to set.

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(PlaylistItem item)
        Appends a playlist item at the end of the playlist.
        Parameters:
        item - A playlist item.
        Returns:
        true if item was successfully added, else false.

        Checks the modification flag.

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the playlist is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the playlist is empty, else false.

      • addPlaylistListener

        public void addPlaylistListener(PlaylistListener listener)
        Adds the specified playlist listener to receive playlist events from this playlist. If the listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        listener - A playlist listener.

      • removePlaylistListener

        public void removePlaylistListener(PlaylistListener listener)
        Removes the specified playlist listener so that it no longer receives playlist events from this playlist. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this playlist. If the listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        listener - A playlist listener.
